word:
There has been a decided wrong with those who have carried their strong spirit into the church, and ruled it. Women have had this strong, untamable spirit, which has been thought by some to be zeal for truth and for God. It is their own natural self-sufficient, unyielding spirit, that would never 


                                    -282- 

endure control or contradiction. They exalt themselves, but God sees their wicked ways and His curse is resting upon them.
